fixes.name: wc_pi
fixes.solution_explanation: WINDOW_MAX(MAX(pi())) returns the constant π across the window. In DAX PI() returns π; since the Tableau formula uses a table calculation (WINDOW_MAX) it must be implemented as a measure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a table calculation (WINDOW_MAX), which requires an aggregate/context-aware evaluation; therefore it should be a measure.
